topic.title: TPB Torrent Dumps >> Dumps in HTML Format
Kodi Addons [TVADDONS]
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/19HuN9AA7of32Z6rzCc5H6HyiDg7LTV4Qn/

Since TVADDONS is currently facing a lawsuit I have downloaded all of the repos and have posted them here. I have also included the Ares Project repo. All repos (~67MB) have been marked optional. Please let me know if optional files are working.

2_1KwGKhCEr4ZtKzwP2EcG4TTiZaJurjfjCA.body: A simple and poorly made site, but it's still a dump

Zipped >> gzip
HTML and CSV Available
I think I got it now, using .tar.gz

3_1KwGKhCEr4ZtKzwP2EcG4TTiZaJurjfjCA.body: I have updated the Kodi Addons. I have removed the Ares Project and added up-to-date repos (December 16, 2017) including Specto, Covenant, Nemesis, Rebirth, The Pyramid, Bob Unleashed, Elysium, Exodus, Genesis Reborn

1_1KwGKhCEr4ZtKzwP2EcG4TTiZaJurjfjCA.body: Exiled-Destiny is now closed. Channel is still open for chat. Any possible future releases can be found at Nyaa.si  as well as many previous releases.
